about_the_game:
Warning! Don’t buy this DLC if you have already purchased the “Raubritter” or “Banneret” DLC because they include all the content from the “Black Knight” DLC.


Buy this DLC to unlock additional exclusive in-game content of the "Black Knight" edition and continue your personal journey!

The DLC includes:

  • !!! All content of “Commoner” DLC
  • !!! All content of “Knight” DLC
  • 1 additional new character slot
  • A unique social title and character card design: “Black Knight”;
  • Exclusive Black Knight’s Cloak;
  • Exclusive social animations of the “Duelist”;
  • 40 additional Rog Points (40 overall. Consumable, you can buy 4 unique skins (weapon and armor) to choose from 24 options);

content_descriptors.notes: This Game content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.
